full_text: Page 2247 -------- Original message -------- From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Date: 7/24/19 11:01 PM (GMT-05:00) To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Fwd: hi and a question >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 07/24/2019 23:01 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com Date: 7/24/19 10:47 PM (GMT-05:00) To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: hi and a question >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 07/24/2019 22:47 >>> hi hope you are well. We saw an article tonight on something called RadarOnline reporting that Jeffrey Epstein attempted to commit suicide at the MCC (unsuccessfully.) Are you in a position to help me on that with some sort of confirmation or information. (Or to dispel its veracity?) thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Reporter, The New York Times Office: 212-556- (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Mobile: 914-672- (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Email: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com @ (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Page 12802 DOJ-OGR-00026016

text_blocks.content: -------- Original message -------- From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Date: 7/24/19 11:01 PM (GMT-05:00) To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Fwd: hi and a question >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 07/24/2019 23:01 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

-------- Original message -------- From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com Date: 7/24/19 10:47 PM (GMT-05:00) To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: hi and a question >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 07/24/2019 22:47 >>> hi hope you are well. We saw an article tonight on something called RadarOnline reporting that Jeffrey Epstein attempted to commit suicide at the MCC (unsuccessfully.) Are you in a position to help me on that with some sort of confirmation or information. (Or to dispel its veracity?) thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Reporter, The New York Times Office: 212-556- (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Mobile: 914-672- (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Email: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @nytimes.com @ (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The email discusses Jeffrey Epstein's attempted suicide at the MCC.
